title: Light in the East

tokens.lyric: Light that drives out the darkness is shining brightly from the
East.

lines.raw: [A]Light that drives out the darkness is shining brightly from the [D]East.

tokens.lyric: Sons and daughters of light are dwelling in the
Garden
there.

lines.raw: [A]Sons and daughters of light are dwelling in the [C#7]Garden [D]there.

tokens.lyric: This is God's land of righteousness, chosen by Him to do His
will;

lines.raw: [A6]This is God's land of righteousness, chosen by Him to do His [E]will;

tokens.lyric: These are God's people, chosen ones, upright in mind and
heart.

lines.raw: [E7]These are God's people, chosen ones, upright in mind and [A]heart.

tokens.lyric: As we now receive the love of
God, our boundless source of
light,

lines.raw: [A]As we now receive the love of [C#7]God, our boundless source of [D]light,

tokens.lyric: Come, let's join together and in
brightness we shall
live;

lines.raw: [F#m]Come, let's join together and in [C#m]brightness we shall [E7]live;

tokens.lyric: We'll shine like the brightest star to all of
heaven and
earth!

lines.raw: [A]We'll shine like the brightest star to all of [C#7]heaven and [D]earth!

tokens.lyric: Good that wins over evil is now uniting in the
East.

lines.raw: [A6]Good that wins over evil is now uniting in the [E7]East.

tokens.lyric: People longing for good are dwelling in the garden there.

lines.raw: [A]People longing for good are dwelling in the garden there.

tokens.lyric: Country of prayer and holy life, honoring God eternally;

lines.raw: [A]Country of prayer and holy life, honoring God eternally;

tokens.lyric: People who wear the robe of white, sacrificing for the Lord;

lines.raw: [A]People who wear the robe of white, sacrificing for the Lord;

tokens.lyric: Love that ends all the hatred is now to blossom in the East.

lines.raw: [A]Love that ends all the hatred is now to blossom in the East.

tokens.lyric: Men refusing to sin are dwelling in the garden there.

lines.raw: [A]Men refusing to sin are dwelling in the garden there.

tokens.lyric: Ridiculed and rejected land, separates good from sinfulness;

lines.raw: [A]Ridiculed and rejected land, separates good from sinfulness;

tokens.lyric: People who know the thorny path knowing God's wondrous love;

lines.raw: [A]People who know the thorny path knowing God's wondrous love;

tokens.lyric: Greatest victory eternal is now beginning in the East.

lines.raw: [A]Greatest victory eternal is now beginning in the East.

tokens.lyric: Those who crush evil ways are dwelling in the garden there.

lines.raw: [A]Those who crush evil ways are dwelling in the garden there.

tokens.lyric: Country divided North and South truly knows good from sinfulness;

lines.raw: [A]Country divided North and South truly knows good from sinfulness;

tokens.lyric: People who shed their precious blood, given for the sins of men;

lines.raw: [A]People who shed their precious blood, given for the sins of men;

tokens.lyric: Brilliant glory of Heaven now comes in power from the East.

lines.raw: [A]Brilliant glory of Heaven now comes in power from the East.

tokens.lyric: Those who carry the cross, are dwelling in the garden there.

lines.raw: [A]Those who carry the cross, are dwelling in the garden there.

tokens.lyric: Country where soon the Sun will rise, welcoming soon the Son of Man;

lines.raw: [A]Country where soon the Sun will rise, welcoming soon the Son of Man;

tokens.lyric: There the bright Rose of Sharon blooms, beautiful garden of God;

lines.raw: [A]There the bright Rose of Sharon blooms, beautiful garden of God;
